content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata xml:lang="en"> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Arctic Landscape Conservation Cooperative</origin> <pubdate>20141124</pubdate> <title>Average historical temperature (degree F) in summer (June - August) and projected changes in air temperature for Northern Alaska.  30-year averages. Handout format.  Maps created using the SNAP 5-GCM composite (AR5-RCP 8.5) and CRU TS3.1 datasets.</title> <edition>2014</edition> <geoform>map</geoform> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Fairbanks, Alaska</pubplace> <publish>Arctic Landscape Conservation Cooperative</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://arcticlcc.org/projects/geophysical/climate-projection-maps/</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>Baseline (1961-1990) average summer temperature in and projected change in temperature for for the northern portion of Alaska.  For the purposes of these maps, 'summer' is defined as June - August.  The Alaska portion of the Arctic LCC's terrestrial boundary is depicted by the black line.  Baseline results for 1961-1990 are derived from Climate Research Unit (CRU) TS3.1 data and downscaled to 2km grids; results for the other time periods (2010-2039, 2040-2069, 2070-2099) are based on the SNAP 5-GCM composite using the AR5-RCP 8.5, downscaled to 2km grids.</abstract> <purpose>This collection of maps summarize historic baseline (1961-1990) and projected change in average summer (June - August) temperature. Baseline results for 1961-1990 are derived from Climate Research Unit (CRU) TS 3.1. data and maps for future time periods are based on a composite of projections from five GCMs (CCSM4 - National Center for Atmospheric Research, Community Earth System Model 4, United States; GFDL-CM3 - NOAA Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory, Coupled Model 3.0, United States; GISS-E2-R - NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies, ModelE/Russell, United States; IPSL-CM5A-LR - Institut Pierre-Simon Laplace, France; MRI-CGCM3 - Meteorological Research Institute, Coupled General Circulation Model version 3.0, Japan) under the AR5-RCP 8.5.  Data courtesy of Scenarios Network for Alaska and Arctic Planning.</purpose> <supplinf>For more information on Scenarios Network for Alaska and Arctic Planning climate projections and CRU data downscaling, please see https://www.snap.uaf.edu.</supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20141124</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-167.4</westbc> <eastbc>-131.68</eastbc> <northbc>77.31</northbc> <southbc>62</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>environment</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>Alaska</placekey> <placekey>Northern Alaska</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None.</accconst> <useconst>None.
